title: Single Syllable Words - Dr. Samuel C. Gipp
description:
Critics of the King James Bible love to claim that it is too difficult to read. Well, what is simpler to read than one syllable words? There are over 900 verses in the King James Bible that contain only one syllable words. If the King James Bible is "difficult to read" then what do you suppose the so-called "easy to read" versions do with these verses? In this book, these verses are reproduced from the King James Bible and compared to 8 popular modern versions.


About the author:
Dr. Gipp is a former pastor, an evangelist, teacher, author and Bible conference speaker. He has the unique ability to digest large amounts of information and then present it in an analytical, understandable, format. His humerous, informative and forceful preaching style make him popular with all ages and keeps him in demand as a Revivalist and Bible conference speaker
